revised_title: On Systems of Linear Indeterminate Equations and Congruences: A New Approach
tldr: This article presents a new method for solving systems of linear indeterminate equations and congruences using the concept of fundamental sets of solutions. The author demonstrates a criterion for resolubility or irresolubility of these systems and applies the method to various problems in number theory, including the Pellian equation and the norm of complex integral numbers.
